divs: Sighting DetailsI was sitting in a dentists chair (in Reidsville) facing an outside window, focusing on a church across the street, trying to calm my nerves, when an orange, child size ball floated across my field of vision from left to right, about 10 feet outside the window. I held my breath, not frightened, but rather totally amazed, as it floated, unhurriedly towards a small stand of landscaped Dogwood type of trees, float behind one and disappear. I thought, "I just saw an orb." I looked up more information on orbs when I got home, but have never been quite satisfied with information I found, because this was not an etheric looking ball, but physically solid looking.I know this is not an extremely dramatic sighting of something out of the ordinary, except to me, but I was watching a UFO story on Discovery last night (in Fayettville,NC)and I immediately took notice of the drawings of the huge, orange spheres that were shown and realized that was the same color orange and looked like what I saw, only much, much smaller. I will always believe this orb was aware that I was there watching it and maybe even wanted me to see it.
